mapper.update:
UPDATE tb_basic_feedback as `tbf`
`tbf`.`id` = #{tbBasicFeedbackPo.id},
`tbf`.`type` = #{tbBasicFeedbackPo.type},
`tbf`.`content` = NULL,
`tbf`.`content` = #{tbBasicFeedbackPo.content},
`tbf`.`images` = NULL,
`tbf`.`images` = #{tbBasicFeedbackPo.images},
`tbf`.`contact` = NULL,
`tbf`.`contact` = #{tbBasicFeedbackPo.contact},
`tbf`.`status` = #{tbBasicFeedbackPo.status},
`tbf`.`isDelete` = #{tbBasicFeedbackPo.isDelete},
`tbf`.`deviceInfo` = NULL,
`tbf`.`deviceInfo` = #{tbBasicFeedbackPo.deviceInfo},
`tbf`.`appVersion` = NULL,
`tbf`.`appVersion` = #{tbBasicFeedbackPo.appVersion},
`tbf`.`replyContent` = NULL,
`tbf`.`replyContent` = #{tbBasicFeedbackPo.replyContent},
`tbf`.`replyAt` = NULL,
`tbf`.`replyAt` = #{tbBasicFeedbackPo.replyAt},
`tbf`.`createdAt` = '',
`tbf`.`createdAt` = #{tbBasicFeedbackPo.createdAt},
`tbf`.`createdUserId` = #{tbBasicFeedbackPo.createdUserId},
`tbf`.`updatedAt` = '',
`tbf`.`updatedAt` = #{tbBasicFeedbackPo.updatedAt},
`tbf`.`updatedUserId` = #{tbBasicFeedbackPo.updatedUserId},
mapper.select:
SELECT
DISTINCT
`tbf`.* FROM tb_basic_feedback as `tbf`
GROUP BY
`tbf`.`#{field}`
HAVING #{tbBasicFeedbackPo.havingClause}

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(
DISTINCT
`tbf`.`id`), 0) as result FROM tb_basic_feedback as `tbf`
GROUP BY
`tbf`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicFeedbackPo.havingClause}

SELECT MAX(
DISTINCT
`tbf`.`id`) as result FROM tb_basic_feedback as `tbf`
GROUP BY
`tbf`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicFeedbackPo.havingClause}

SELECT MIN(
DISTINCT
`tbf`.`id`) as result FROM tb_basic_feedback as `tbf`
GROUP BY
`tbf`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicFeedbackPo.havingClause}
